results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/health-care/1169
results.notes: Routine and urgent dental care for OHP multicare dental coverage only. Screening same as primary care services. Must meet income guidelines. Fees on sliding scale based on family size and income. Call for new patient appointments and referral to community clinics.

results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/multnomah-county-resources/2085
results.notes: Medical Teams international Dental Van offers services at various locations throughout Portland. Must call specific locations for referral and scheduling.

results.name/_title: Friends of Creston Dental Children's Clinic
results.hours: Open school days only, 8:30 a.m.-3:30 p.m. Closed summers.
results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/health-care/1213
results.name/_text: Friends of Creston Dental Children's Clinic
results.notes: Assistance League of Portland Dental Center at Creston School: Urgent and routine care for K-12 only. Must be in Portland Public Schools, receive free/reduced lunch and have no dental insurance. Call for appointment. $10 suggested donation.

results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/1218
results.notes: Routine and urgent dental care for OHP multicare dental coverage only. Call for new patient appointments and referral to one of several community clinics. Various locations.

results.hours: 8 a.m. - 4:45 p.m., Mon.-Thurs.; 8 a.m.- 4 p.m., Fri.
results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/dental/1567
results.notes: Call one day in advance at 8 a.m. for urgent care. Reduced fee, due at time of service (approximately 30 percent of private fees). Urgent care up to $216.00. Small clinic, limited availability.

results.hours: 7:45 a.m.-5:00p.m., Monday-Friday; Sat. 8a.m.-1p.m. Walk in emergencies with $100-$200 due at time of service.
results.name: http://www.rosecityresource.org/resources/1222
results.notes: Low-cost dental program for insured and uninsured people, including patients with HIV/AIDS. Proof of income requested. Sliding fee scale for enrolled patients. $59 for emergencies, plus additional costs for services $96-166 per tooth.
